com.oregonscientific.meep.msm
Class ServerConnectionDelegate

java.lang.Object
  com.oregonscientific.meep.msm.ServerConnectionDelegate

public class ServerConnectionDelegate
extends Object

Represents a connection to MEEP server.

Author:
Stanley Lam

Connects to the MEEP server

Parameters:

isConnected

public boolean isConnected()
Indicates whether or not connection is established with a MEEP server

Returns:

willAutoReconnect

Returns whether or not the delegate will automatically reconnect to server when connection is lost

Returns:

setAllowedIdleTime

public void setAllowedIdleTime(long idleTime)
                        throws ServerConnectionException
Sets the maximum amount time the connection can remain idle before the delegate tries to reconnect with the MEEP server. The new idle time will not take effect immediately. It will only come into effect the next time the handshake task is rescheduled

Parameters:
idleTime - The maximum amount of time (in milliseconds) the connection can remain idle
Throws:
ServerConnectionException

setServerEventListener

public void setServerEventListener(ServerEventListener listener)
Register a callback to be invoked when a notification is received from a MEEP server

Parameters:
listener - The notification listener that will be invoked
